text: Lindsay Lohan's lawyer says the actress checked into rehab on Thursday, but the facility has not been officially sanctioned by the court that ordered her to serve 90 days of treatment. Attorney Mark Jay Heller told LA Superior Court Judge James R. Dabney that Lohan, 26, had checked into Morningside Recovery in Newport Beach, CA, according to the Associated Press.
title: Lindsay Lohan Checks Into Court - Ordered Rehab.
